member.name: DRIVE_LAYOUT_INFORMATION_EX
member.summary: Contains extended information about a drive's partitions.

summary.para: The style of the partitions on the drive enumerated by the enumeration.

| Style | Value | Meaning | | --- | --- | --- | | PARTITION_STYLE_MBR | 0 | Master boot record (MBR) format.| | PARTITION_STYLE_GPT | 1 | GUID Partition Table (GPT) format. | | PARTITION_STYLE_RAW | 2 | Partition not formatted in either of the recognized formats—MBR or GPT. |

member.name: DRIVE_LAYOUT_INFORMATION_EX.PartitionCount
member.summary: The number of partitions on the drive. On hard disks with the MBR layout, this value will always be a multiple of 4. Any partitions that are actually unused will have a partition type of PARTITION_ENTRY_UNUSED (0) set in the PartitionType member of the structure of the Mbr member of the structure of the PartitionEntry member of this structure.

member.name: DRIVE_LAYOUT_INFORMATION_EX.DUMMYUNIONNAME.Mbr
member.summary: A structure containing information about the master boot record type partitioning on the drive.

member.name: DRIVE_LAYOUT_INFORMATION_EX.DUMMYUNIONNAME.Gpt
member.summary: A structure containing information about the GUID disk partition type partitioning on the drive.

member.name: DRIVE_LAYOUT_INFORMATION_EX.PartitionEntry
member.summary: A variable-sized array of structures, one structure for each partition on the drive.
